page.title: 17CHILD'S DAY IN BENINGTON (2)
page.content: 08.00 hr.Went into Games Room and found elder Brother playing "Pyramids" on our Computer (BBC MICRO). Watched for a while and then I played. 09.00 hr.Let out Dog for a run. Helped Dad feed the Chickens and bring in four eggs to the Kitchen. Found Mum putting Washing-up into Dish-Washer.Then helped Dad clear mud & soil left by builders. Collected it in bags and put it into field while my Brother and both Sisters were playing Tennis in the Drive. 12.00 hr.Returned to Kitchen for Drink of Coke. Went back into Playroom with Brother and we both played a competi- tion on the computer. 14.00 hr.Played Snooker with Brother. 15.00 hr. Back to Computer. (Cont.)
